metadata.title: CVE-2024-50120 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: Handle kstrdup failures for passwordsIn smb3_reconfigure(), after duplicating ctx->password andctx->password2 with kstrdup(), we need to check for allocationfailures.If ses->password allocation fails, return -ENOMEM.If ses->password2 allocation fails, free ses->password, set itto NULL, and return -ENOMEM.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
